title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 197.1 - Form for certification and application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 197.1 - Form for certification and application

State Regulations

Applications by farm wineries, pursuant to subdivision 42
of section
16
of the Agriculture and Markets Law and subdivision 5 of section
76-a
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law
for authorization to manufacture or sell wine produced form grapes grown
outside New York State; and certifications as to the quantity of New York grown
grapes unavailable due to natural disaster, act of God or continuing adverse
weather condition shall be made using the following form: Image

Image

Image

Image

Image

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
197.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
